PHP
Run:
$ sudo pecl install mongodb
Add the following line to your php.ini file:
extension=mongodb.so
Windows users should include php_mongodb.dll into &php.ini;
HHVM
HHVM users should download the latest from S3 for the time being.
Once downloaded, execute the following steps:
cd libbson ./autogen.sh cd ..
cd libmongoc ./autogen.sh cd ..
hphpize cmake .
make -j 5 make install
Add the following line to your php.ini file (usually found in /etc/hhvm):
hhvm.dynamic_extension_path=/usr/local/hhvm/3.9.1/lib/hhvm/extensions/20150212 hhvm.dynamic_extensions[mongodb]=mongodb.so
